Feedback Request.desc:
Community feedback is being requested for the City of Barberton's Multi-Hazard Mitigation Plan

Get involved:
– Read the draft plan online or at the Barberton Public Library
– Complete the online survey or fill out the feedback form
– Attend the public meeting on 2/11 at the Active Adult Center

<i class='icon-warning'></i> Road Closur.desc:
Austin Drive - Closed 7/11 - 8/11 from 5th St/SR619 to East West Heatherwood Drive (Map)

Wooster Road West - Open through 8/29 while utilities work and paving completed between Johnson Road and 37th St

Please follow the posted detours.

Change for Change.desc: This month's Change for Change will be Friday, 12/19 4-7pm at Block 7 Bar & Grill; it benefits the Winebrenner Family

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 1/.desc: City offices will be closed January 19 in observance of Martin Luther King Jr. Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 2/.desc: City offices will be closed February 16 in observance of Presidents Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 4/.desc: City offices will be closed April 3 in observance of Good Friday

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 5/.desc: City offices will be closed May 25 in observance of Memorial Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 7/.desc: City offices will be closed July 3 in observance of Independence Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 9/.desc: City offices will be closed September 7 in observance of Labor Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 11.desc: City offices will be closed November 11 in observance of Veterans Day
City offices will be closed November 26-27 in observance of Thanksgiving

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 12.desc: City offices will be closed December 24-25 in observance of Christmas

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 1/.desc: City offices will be closed January 1 in observance of New Years Day
